transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Haan, mai Nikhil bol raha hun Balaji jo profile hai, abhi bhi shayad baat hua tha aapko.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haan, woh mai bola tha ki usme jaise hum log ka yeh machine hi hai na sir. Toh isme mere mai jaise blades wagera mai bhi deal karta hun aur spares parts wagera mai bhi deal karta hun. Toh agar mai matlab profile mai woh sab bhi category se dalna chahun. Aur toh kaise hoga woh?
Executive: Uh, products mein jaakar aap add product karke use dal sakte ho but meri suggestion aapko yeh rahegi ki aap ek baar ek hafta aise service use karo aur uh phir aap kal parso mein kal tak mai aapke paas aapki jo account manager hai uska contact karati hun usko aap bata dena. Woh pehle aapko guide kar degi kaise aap product add karoge and next time se aap khud se kar dena. Matlab jo aap add karwana chahte ho woh aapka kal parso mein add kara deti hun mai.
Customer: Accha matlab isko kya matlab mujhe khud se karna padega kya add?
Executive: Aap khud se bhi add kar sakte hai sir. Portal aapka hai aap hi ko karna hota hai but aapko category ka knowledge nahi hota hai na clients ko. That's why hum log apne behalf pe usko kar dete hai sir. Lekin agar sirf product add karne ki baat hai aur related category hai na toh woh related category hum add kar dete hai lekin sirf product agar add karne ki baat hai woh aap aap hi seller ko hi karna hota hai.
Customer: Woh toh phir details, pricing yeh sab seller ko hi dalna hota hai. Company aapki aap apne according usko chala sakte ho sir. Hamara usme koi issue nahi rehta.
Executive: Ji ji nahi woh toh hai but matlab kya hai na woh mujhe actually accha se aata nahi hai dalna toh isiliye.
Executive: Nahi sir sikha denge na acche se kaise aayega jab system yeh abhi shuru kiya hai toh acche se kaise aa jayega sir woh shuru karoge, dheere dheere samajh aa jayega toh hota rahega sir. Hai na? Apne aap toh nahi aata service.
Customer: Nahi nahi wohi mai bol raha hun woh ki jaise.
Executive: Toh aap aisa karo na. Aap aisa karo aap na apne phone mein jo jahan pe latest buylead ka option hai wahi pe product ka bhi option hai. Product pe click karo. Waha pe jaise hi aap open karoge wahi pe top pe aa jayega add product. Add product pe aap apne naye product jo add karna chahte ho woh add kar lena aap naam likh ke.
Customer: Nahi toh jab aap woh matlab kya bolte hai jisse aap woh aap manager ka baat bol rahe hai na. Toh unhi se mai seekh lunga sir.
Executive: Haan ji aisa kar lijiye koi issue nahi hai. Mai wahi bol rahi hun na aapko ek se do din mein mai aapki unki side se callback arrange kara deti hun. Woh aapka add karwa degi woh aapko sikha bhi degi kaise add karte hai toh next time se aapko kabhi kuch add karna hoga apni side se kar lijiyega aap. Theek hai? Matlab zaruri nahi hai ki account manager hi woh cheez kare woh aapki side se bhi hota hai hume guide hi karna hota hai but abhi kyunki nayi cheeze hai is wajah se maine aapke behalf pe khud aapke samne start product add kiya hai.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Theek hai aap bhi kar sakte hai. Aap nahi abhi aap mujhe guide kar rahi thi toh isliye maine aapko call kar liya ki nahi aap woh jo matlab karna hai woh phir abhi kar leta hun isliye mai socha ki aap abhi agar mujhe.
Executive: Maine aapko bataya toh sir woh basic agar aapko chahiye sikhna hai toh maine bataya toh aapko aap mujhe bhi mai call pe hun aap apna ek baar IndiaMART open karo bata deti hun isme bahut bahut zyada kuch nahi hai aap bas product name bhi dal doge na related category woh khud catch kar lega agar woh wrong hoga mai check kar lunga mai correct mai correct kar dungi koi issue nahi hai aapko mai guide kar deti hun kaise kar sakte ho. IndiaMART app open kijiye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Latest buylead wali jagah pe jaiye matlab home page pe jayenge agar aap woh three lines pe click karo taki woh open ho jaye sari side aur waha pe product option dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Ji latest buylead ji.
Executive: Haan product option dikh raha hai?
Customer: Latest buylead mein product option?
Executive: Nahi nahi latest buylead lead manager yeh sare options aate hai na jahan pe likha hai hi.
Customer: Product option mila? Haan. Ji mila?
Customer: Toh isme toh product manage product likha hua hai.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir ruk jaiye call pe.

Executive: Sir agar aap manage product pe click karoge na product wali line pe aaoge toh niche ki side add product aur add multiple product option dikh raha hoga aapko.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Manage product mein click kiya ji. Add product multiple products.
Executive: Hai na multiple add multiple product pe click karoge ek jo jo product maan lo aapko cutter add karna hai blade add karna hai toh aapne ek jagah cutter dal diya ek jagah blade dal diya ek sath aap multiple product add karoge jaise hi aap woh dalte jaoge na niche save karne ka option aayega save karte jao.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Theek hai. Baki sir uh uh mai aapko apna number bhi de deti hun koi bhi concern aap mujhe mere number pe call karo 96 wale number pe call mat kijiyega theek hai kyunki uska concern bar bar raise ho jata hai phir woh bar bar close karna padega aapko bhi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Theek hai? Abhi samajh aaya sir ek baar karke dekh lo koi product yaad toh hoga hi add product ya multiple product mein ek product ka naam dalo.
Customer: Ji haan theek hai.
Executive: Haan phir kya option aa raha hai dekho batao mujhe.
Customer: Ji naam aa gaya. Hai na product ji add photo karna padega.
Executive: Add more click karoge aur add kar doge.
Customer: Nahi nahi matlab ek photo ka option aaya photo dalna padega isme.
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Add photo photo dalna padega product ka photo dalna padega.
Executive: Aap ek product detail daloge toh uski puri detail toh dalegi na yeh sirf seller ke liye hai yeh. Sirf product ka naam ya detail dal kar chod doge uska nahi rahega sir customer product dekh ke kharidta hai na.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Yes. Samajh aaya aapko ek product aap dal ke dekhna usko theek hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay?
Customer: Ji yeh product mein dal ke isme photo dal dunga aur size dal dunga na.
Executive: Haan niche save karne ka option aa jayega save kar doge phir aap refresh karke dobara se app open karke manage product mein dekhna jaake product add ho gaya hoga theek hai?
Customer: Ji ji ji waise hi karke karna hai na yeh.
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Theek hai?
Customer: Okay okay okay.
Executive: Mai aapko apne number se ek baar whatsapp pe hi likh ke bhej deti hun koi bhi concern aap mujhe connect kar lena theek hai us number pe. Thank you sir.
Customer: Okay. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance adding products.

- Wants to add blades and spare parts.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to add products.

- Offered to have account manager assist.

- Guided customer through adding a product.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send her number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- product, add, category, manager, guide
